settings.title: Benefits
settings.content:
12% triple-acid blend (AHA + BHA + PHA) resurfaces dull skin and brightens for instant radiance.

Unclogs pores to help clear body acne and keratosis pilaris, while preventing future breakouts and ingrown bumps.

Buffs away rough, bumpy buildup and dry patches, revealing softer, more even-looking skin that’s touchably smooth.

Use as a exfoliating scrub and a leave on mask for a deeper clarifying treatment – gentle on all skin types.

settings.title: How to use
settings.content:
As a scrub + mask duo: After cleansing your body, apply to damp skin and massage in gentle circular motions for 30–60 seconds to physically exfoliate and boost circulation. Then, leave on as a mask for up to 5 minutes to let the acids and actives deeply clarify and brighten. Rinse thoroughly. Use 2–3 times per week or more often, as tolerated.

Sopele's tip: Best used before shaving, self-tanning, or layering on your body serum and cream — for smoother application, better absorption, and maximum glow from neck to toes.

settings.title: Key ingredients
settings.content:
12% TRIPLE ACID COMPLEX (AHA + BHA + PHA) - A powerful blend of glycolic, lactic, salicylic, and gluconolactone acids that work together to unclog pores, dissolve dead skin, smooth texture, and support brighter, clearer skin over time.

VOLCANIC SAND + PUMICE - Gentle physical exfoliants that buff away surface buildup and rough patches without microtears — perfect for treating KP, strawberry skin, and dry, dull areas.

KAOLIN CLAY - A detoxifying mineral clay that absorbs excess oil, draws out impurities, and helps clarify congested areas like the back, chest, and bikini line.

TRANEXAMIC ACID - A targeted brightening active that helps fade dark spots and discoloration, especially in areas prone to friction, shaving, or breakouts.

BIOACTIVE FERMENT BLEND - A microbiome-supporting mix of fermented extracts and plant-derived enzymes that help brighten, smooth, and calm the skin while reinforcing the barrier.

settings.text: What’s considered exceptional for the face is now foundational for the body, with potent actives in elevated concentrations setting a new standard in body care.
When your body gets the same treatment as your face, results stop being a maybe.
Strawberry skin & texture
Martina, 26 - Consumer study
I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!

Strawberry skin is caused by clogged pores and keratin buildup, leading to small red or dark bumps, typically on the legs and arms. This scrub gently resurfaces textured skin, clears buildup, and helps smooth and soften rough patches. With consistent use, it visibly reduces bumps and reveals clearer, more even-toned skin.
Ingrown hairs & dark spots
Sanja, 36 - Verified Customer
I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!

Ingrown hairs form when dead skin builds up and traps the hair beneath the surface, often leading to inflammation, bumps, and post-shave marks. Over time, this can leave behind dark spots and uneven tone. This scrub helps by gently exfoliating the skin’s surface, clearing buildup, and supporting healthy cell turnover. The result is smoother skin, fewer ingrowns, and visibly brighter, more even tone over time.
Body acne & uneven skin tone
Dorotea, 26 - Verified Customer
I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!

Breakouts and uneven tone are often caused by clogged pores, excess oil, and buildup that disrupts skin clarity. This scrub helps reduce congestion, calm active blemishes, and gently fade dark marks over time—leaving skin visibly clearer, smoother, and more balanced.

settings.text: Timing matters
After showering, apply to clean skin—slightly damp or fully dry. Both are effective, but avoid applying immediately after shaving or waxing to prevent irritation.
Smooth and absorb
Massage a thin, even layer into areas prone to breakouts, texture, or dark marks. Let it fully absorb before layering other products.
Follow with cream

Use 1–2 times per week in the evening. Always follow with body cream to replenish hydration
and support the skin barrier.

settings.title: Fragrance-free, by design
settings.content: While our Body Cream and Scrub are softly scented to enhance your bodycare ritual, the Body Serum was intentionally left fragrance-free. This choice allows the formula to focus purely on performance — making it ideal for sensitive skin, post-shave areas, or anyone who wants results without added scent. It layers seamlessly with your favorite Sopele products or your personal fragrance, letting you enjoy the benefits of the serum while wearing any scent you love.

Repair + Calm

Radish root ferment - a gentle plant-based ferment with natural soothing and antimicrobial properties to help calm and protect skin.

settings.question: Where does The Scrub & Mask fit into my routine?
settings.answer: It’s the first step in your Sopele routine—used in the shower, right after cleansing your body. Apply to damp skin, massage gently to exfoliate, and for better results, leave it on for 2–5 minutes as a mask before rinsing. Follow with the Sopele Body Serum and Body Cream while your skin is still slightly damp to maximize absorption and smoothness.
